arcade.sim.input

Class InputBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.sim.input.InputBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler

    public class InputBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
    Custom builder for simulation setup XMLs.

    The class checks for specific tags, which determine where the parsed data is placed for further processing by the Series class. Once the end tag for a given <series> is reached, a new Series object is instantiated. All content in the setup XML is stored as attribute-value pairs; there is no content between tags (the characters method is not used).

    General structure of the XML file (attributes not listed): 

         <set>
         <series>
             <simulation>
                 <potts />
             </simulation>
             <agents>
                 <populations />
             </agents>
             <environment />
         </series>
         ...
     </set>

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public java.util.ArrayList<Series> build(java.lang.String xml,
                                         Box parameters,
                                         boolean isVis)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Builds Series from the given XML file.

        Reads through the setup XML file using an SAX parser with custom defined content handler, which creates the Series objects as they are parsed. SAX parses XML files using event handlers and therefore does not load the entire XML file into memory (in contrast to DOM).

        Parameters:
        xml - the XML file
        parameters - the default parameter values loaded from parameter.xml
        isVis - true if run with visualization, false otherwise
        Returns:
        a list of Series instances
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException

      • updateBox

        void updateBox(java.lang.String list,
               java.lang.String tag,
               org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
        Updates a Box dictionary with tagged attributes.

        Attributes are added to the last entry in the list of dictionaries. One of the attributes must be "id" which is used as the id for the entry. Attributes "tag" and "target" are concatenated to the id as tag/id:target.

        Parameters:
        list - the list the box is in
        tag - the entry tag
        atts - the attributes to add
